While above 50% Energy, 10% of Damage Taken is absorbed by Energy

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgCurrent}|floor()%</> increased <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>
When you kill a <me_Burn>Burning</> enemy you have a 25% chance to cause an explosion dealing <b>{Dmg}|floor()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{RadiusCurrent}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>{DmgNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</>
When you kill a <me_Burn>Burning</> enemy you have a 25% chance to cause an explosion dealing <b>{Dmg}|floor()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{RadiusNext}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Explosion has <b>-0.5m</> radius and <b>50%</> more damage
